page.title: 03The shops in Six Bells.
page.content: There are fifteen shops in Alexandra Road in Six Bells, Abertillery,as well as a few empty ones.The occupied shops are: {Barrells (Fruit and Vegetables). {A Photographic Shop. {Pritchard's (Chemist). {Woodley's (Butcher). {M.J and J.Spencer (Paints). {Electronic Entertainment Services. {J. Cook (Milliner). {Post Office. {W. MARTIN and Sons (Newsagents) {Vals. (assorted goods). {John's Fish Bar. {Mark's Bric a Brac (second hand goods) {Jean's Florist. {Sid Davies (book makers) {Six Bells General Store/Spar (grocer) We devised a questionaire of fifteen questions to ask the shopkeepers.
